DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the pharmacokinetics of aldesleukin in patients with metastatic renal cell cancer and metastatic melanoma
DOC.brief_title: Aldesleukin in Patients With Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma and Metastatic Melanoma
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Performance Status Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group: 0 or 1 Adequate organ function Exclusion criteria: Pregnancy or lactation Prior treatment with aldesleukin Organ transplant Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
